website_summaries.verdict: The LG EnV2 is not much more than a slimmed down version of the EnV, but it still serves as an excellent high-end messaging phone.
pros: The LG EnV2 is a slim and attractive handset, with a roomy keypad, bright dual displays, a good multimedia feature set, a full QWERTY keyboard, plus great call quality
cons: The LG EnV2 does not offer newer features from the first EnV
Also, photo quality was mediocre, and the external display can be a bit too small
Streaming video quality could also be a lot better

customer_reviews.title: Best Non-Smart Phone Out There
customer_reviews.text: This is a very late review, but I'd be awful in not sharing my thoughts on this phone after being, due to total blindness, forced into a 'Smart Phone'. The ENV2 had easy-to-feel buttons on it both on the outside and on the inside, too. It also had a wonderful voice-over feature that was extra helpful in navigating the phone with extremely low vision. I ended up going through four of these until I had no choice but to get an iPhone. The iPhone offers a lot more accessibility for a totally blind individual but going from physical keys you can 'feel' to 'chicken-pecking' a flat keyboard has been very annoying. May you rest in peace, ENV2.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone but a bit lazy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone for a basic phone with querty keypad for texting, good audible quality. BUT it turns off randomly and that just gets annoying with everyday use of a cell phone. I must say that the Brown Box company has been amazing with their customer service. Would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: bwise

customer_reviews.title: This is not the phone you are looking for...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great for texting and good for talking as long as you use a bluetooth headset. The mic on the phone doesn't work well at all. I had to reboot the phone before I called someone or they couldn't hear me. The speakerphone was terrible. I ended up ordering a new phone. I will never buy another LG phone.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Buying a phone because you hate smart phones
customer_reviews.text: My phone broke and I refuse to turn over to iphones or smart phones. Whats wrong with a physical keyboard?? Nothing right?? Instead of ranting I will just say that for the most part I was satisfied. The charger was a complete joke as it is about 10 inches long and hung off the wall. I got what I paid for and I am happy. Although the battery is now complete garbage, figured I can just replace it. Its not bad, feel like I got an okay deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Ratings
customer_reviews.text: The phone came a day or so earlier than promised. The phone was in good working condition- ready to be activated. Cosmetically the phone was in good condition as described. The price was very affordable. The Maroon phone I ordered, however did have a light blue faceplate (which was not the packaging film). That would have been my biggest and only complaint. Phone is currently being used, and no issues to speak of otherwise.

customer_reviews.title: Saved the Day!!
customer_reviews.text: I was on vacation and my VLG EnV2 in black fell off the bed and I couldn't see the screen when I opened it. So sucked!! My brother was in Afganistan and was texting me but with the large text's I couldn't see anything past one sentence with it closed..was so glad that I was able to get on-line at the hotel and buy the same phone but in red. Received it rather quickly and was able to keep in communication with my brother before it was black out again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than freebie phones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone as a replacement for the last enV2 which I had dropped on the floor and broken. To put simply, it has been better in my experience to purchase a used phone that you know will hold quality than to pay $30 for your "free" phone from your provider of which you have no clue about its performance. When you know something works, stick to it. Especially if it's cheaper than going another route.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Siu

customer_reviews.title: It's Just OK
customer_reviews.text: If you think your going to get a clean almost new phone forget it. What I received was a phone with a lot of wear on the case and a missing cover for the smart chip. Now don't get me wrong it did work and it is still working and solved my problem as an inexpensive replacement for my old phone. So it served it's purpose but I would have liked something that didn't look like it was rode hard and put way wet.
customer_reviews.author: martha beumer

customer_reviews.title: Decent no data plan phone...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this plan because I do not want a data plan and many of the other models require a data plan. I did not want to increase my plan cost and this phone allows me to keep my current no data plan. The key board is convenient, phone is sturdy and durable, strong signal, decent features. A good buy and decent phone if you do not want a data plan.
customer_reviews.author: LMK

customer_reviews.title: Charging jack problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to replace an old one I had for years that would no longer charge. This one lasted 3 months and then the charging jack fell out of it. Not sure if I want to get a 3rd one or not, but I do like the phone a lot. It is small, simple, and has a qwerty keyboard - just the things I need - nothing fancy.....

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My cel hinge broke so I needed a phone fast! I found a similar cel and received it in 2 days! I wanted a similar phone so I could use the same batteries. Now I have 2 extra batteries from the old phone & 1 from this one, total of 3! Awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Intermittent problems...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th time I have gone online to replace this phone over a 7 year time period. I love the phone and typically the phone doesn't get glichy until I have had the phone for about a year and a half. This phone however, is refurbished (like the 3 before this one) and it turns off by itself on me, periodically, the front keypad won't respond or work at times. I'm just hoping this one will last for another year, but at this rate, probably not. I love everything about it though, the keyboard when it opens, it's nice compact size, takes decent pictures, etc. Just not getting the performance from this one I usually do.

product_meta.title: Verizon LG enV2 VX9100 No Contract 3G Camera QWERTY MP3 Cell Phone Maroon
product_meta.description: The LG enV2 VX-9100 is one of the best phones for text messaging. A full QWERTY keypad, large QVGA display and fast 3G EVDO data makes it the ideal text messaging phone. This phone also comes with a 2 megapixel camera, a MP3 player, Bluetooth compatibility, and microSD slot for additional storage. The enV2 has a highly responsive keypad, it is an easy-to-use device, and has great sound quality.
feature_bullets: This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars69 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
